blocks.title: 2017 Justia Online Day
blocks.description: Our 4th annual Justia Online Day was another success! This year we took our talks on the road so that we could reach even more people, and we had a full house. Justia Online Day is a series of talks about internet-related topics given by Justia specialists for students who are interested in information, technology, and society.

blocks.title: Tim Presents on Sustainable Business Models for Free Law
blocks.description: Justia CEO Tim Stanley attended the 2017 Law Via the Internet Conference at Rutgers Law School, where he spoke about sustainable business models for free law. Justia is committed to providing free public access to legal materials, and to helping others with that same goal. Among the topics Tim discussed were advertising, donations, lawyer directories, and corporate counsel content.
